page.title: 011n and round Stamford Bridge
page.content: The land around the area is mainly fields.Stamford Bridge is the main village.High and Low Catton are mostly farms.People from the Cattons come to Stamford Bridge for shopping,dentist, clubs,doctor and school.Gate Helmsley is a small community.They mostly go to York for their shopping and the children go to school in York. The Cornmill restaurant is on the site of the original cornmill recorded in Domesday Book 1086.The Manor House is now an old folks home.It is built on the site of the original manor house. The railway viaduct is now dangerous as trains no longer come through Stamford Bridge.It is the site of the famous battle between King Harold of England and the Vikings 1066.Some streets are named after people in the battle.eg.Godwins Way:Hardrada Way. Population in 20 years,from{600to3000.
